price: 1. Yalla saytunnosseh qaranwah addaay, baaxoh addal tanim, Usuk (Yalli) maysoliy naggaarah yani.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
